sorcer.service

Interface Revaluation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Context<T>, IControlContext, InclusiveContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AltExertion, AntTask, ArrayContext, Block, ComprehensiveContext, ContextResult, ControlContext, EvaluationTask, Job, ListContext, LoopExertion, NetBlock, NetJob, NetTask, ObjectBlock, ObjectJob, ObjectTask, OptExertion, ParModel, PositionalContext, ServiceContext, ServiceExertion, SharedAssociativeContext, SharedIndexedContext, SignedServiceTask, Task

    public interface Revaluation
    If an Evaluation that is Revaluation isRevaluable then it returns the revaluated value, otherwise returns the evaluated value ( #getValue(Parameter...))

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRevaluable()
      Returns true if this dataContext is revaluable, otherwise false
      void setRevaluable(boolean isRevaluable)
      Assign revaluability of this dataContext.

    • Method Detail

      • isRevaluable

        boolean isRevaluable()
        Returns true if this dataContext is revaluable, otherwise false
        Returns:
        true if this dataContext is revaluable

      • setRevaluable

        void setRevaluable(boolean isRevaluable)

        Assign revaluability of this dataContext.

        Parameters:
        isRevaluable - set revaluable
